text: César and Rosalie () is a 1972 French romance movie directed by Claude Sautet and starring Romy Schneider, Yves Montand, Sami Frey, Bernard Le Coq, Eva Maria Meineke, Isabelle Huppert, Gisela Hahn. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 romance movies Category:French romance movies Category:Movies directed by Claude Sautet
title: César and Rosalie
